message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $112.
I understand that you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $110. This is my final offer.
I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I'm not willing to sell the product for $100, Bob. That's below my minimum price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105, and that's my final offer.
